feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 12:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to light snow before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
